name: Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewAction
summary: A PreviewAction provides options to configure actions used by the iOS 9 3D-Touch "Peek and Pop" feature.

events.name: click
events.summary: Fired when the device detects a click against a preview action.
events.description: This event provides different properties depending on the view the Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewContext is assigned to. Every event has the index property to identify the clicked action. If the Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewContext is assigned to a Titanium.UI.ListView, the event provides the additional properties itemIndex, sectionIndex and itemId to identify the previewed row and section, respectively.

properties.name: index
properties.summary: The index of the clicked action.

properties.name: itemIndex
properties.summary:
The index of the clicked row, if the `previewContext` property of the <Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewContext>
is a <Titanium.UI.ListView>.

properties.name: sectionIndex
properties.summary:
The index of the clicked section, if the `previewContext` property of the <Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewContext>
is a <Titanium.UI.ListView>.

properties.name: itemId
properties.summary:
The item ID of cell, if the `previewContext` property of the <Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewContext>
is a <Titanium.UI.ListView>.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Provides a title to be shown when "peeking" a view referenced in the Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewContext.
